R packages you will need
========================================================

## knitr

```{r}
install.packages("knitr", dependencies=TRUE)
```

## rjson

```{r}
install.packages("rjson")
```

## plyr

```{r}
install.packages("plyr")
```

## zoo

```{r}
install.packages("zoo")
```

## ggplot2

```{r}
install.packages("ggplot2")
```
